summary: Bitcoin Price and Ethereum Reverse Sharply, Key Support Nearby
title: Bitcoin Price and Ethereum Reverse Sharply, Key Support Nearby
content: Bitcoin price attempted a strong increase above the $20,000 resistance zone. BTC failed and declined sharply below $19,000. It is currently (03:10 UTC) showing bearish signs, but it is testing a major support at $18,500.

Similarly, most major altcoins started a steady decline. ETH broke the $1,300 support and declined to $1,265. XRP is down over 10% and trading near the $0.42 support. ADA might move towards the $0.42 support zone.

After a decent increase above the $19,500 resistance, bitcoin price attempted more upsides. BTC cleared the $20,000 resistance zone and the 50-hour simple moving average. However, the bears were active below the $20,500 resistance. The price formed a short-term top and started a fresh decline below the $20,000 level. It declined over 5% and broke the $19,000 level. On the downside, an initial support is near the $18,500 level. The next major support is near the $18,350 zone, below which the price could slide to $17,500.
On the upside, the price is facing resistance near the $19,000 level. The next major resistance is near $19,150, above which the price might start a steady increase.

Ethereum price also followed a similar pattern after it was not able to clear the $1,400 resistance zone. ETH reacted to the downside below the $1,350 support. It even broke the $1,300 level and the 50-hour simple moving average. On the downside, an initial support is near the $1,265 level. The next major support is $1,255, below which price could test $1,200.
On the upside, the price is facing resistance near the $1,300 level. The next major resistance is near the $1,320 level, above which the price could visit the $1,350 resistance.
Cardano (ADA) started a fresh decline after it failed to clear $0.465. The price reacted to the downside and broke the $0.45 support. The next major support sits at $0.42.
BNB is down 5% and approaching the $265 support level. If the price fails to stay above the $265 support, there is a risk of a move towards the $255 level.
Solana (SOL) is down 7% and there was a move below the $33.00 level. The price is now approaching the $32.00 level, below which there is a risk of a move towards $31.20.
DOGE started a fresh decline and there was a move below the $0.060 support. If there are more losses, the price may perhaps decline towards the $0.058 level.
XRP price started a major decline and traded below the $0.45 support. The price is down over 10% and there was a move towards the $0.42 support.
Many altcoins are moving lower, including LUNC, RVN, ALGO, LDO, ATOM, SNX, 1INCH, NEXO, RUNE, CHZ, and CRO. Out of these, LUNC trimmed gains and declined below the $0.00027 level.
Overall, bitcoin price trimmed most gains and traded below $19,000. If BTC fails to stay above $18,350, there could be a sharp decline in the near term.
